DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare characteristic safety oral administration G0041 ( 75/100mg ) 2 tablet Clopidogrel 75mg 2 tablet & Aspirin 100mg 2 capsule coadministration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics & Safety Study Clopidogrel 75mg Aspirin 100mg Coadministration
DOC.criteria: healthy male volunteer age 20 50 year old weight 55kg within range ±20 % IBW neither congenital/chronic disease pathological symptoms/findings result medical examination doctor determine suitable subject within 3 week ago administration Hypersensitivitiy ( history hypersensitivity ) aspirin clopidogrel Active Liver Diseases exceed 1.5 time normal range AST , ALT , total bilirubin Exceed normal range PT , aPTT , BT & platelet count 150,000/㎣ exceed 350,000/㎣ Creatinine clearance < 80 mL/min Gastrointestinal disease surgery affect absorption drug Congenital galactose intolerance , lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Excessive drinking ( exceed 21units/week ) Smoking 10 cigarette per day
